CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingDeckNameHint: Exact name of the Deck to use for initiative.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingAutoRedrawHint: Automatically draw new cards for all combatants at the start of each new round.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingResetInitiativeHi: Clear initiative cards at the start of each new round (if Auto-Redraw is off). If disabled, initiative persists.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingResetOnEndHint: Automatically delete the Initiative Deck and Discard pile when a combat encounter is deleted.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingEnableSplashHint: If enabled, shows a splash screen and plays a sound when a Joker is drawn.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingSfxPathHint: Path to the sound file to play when a Joker is drawn. Defaults to module's sfx.mp3.
CARD_INITIATIVE.SettingFontFamilyHint: Select the font used for initiative numbers and the Joker splash screen.
CARD_INITIATIVE.ErrorDeckNotFound: Card Deck Initiative: Deck '{deckName}' not found! Please check your settings.
CARD_INITIATIVE.ErrorDeckEmpty: Card Deck Initiative: Deck is empty and cannot be reshuffled!
